short_summary: Request for Proposal for Right to Repair Technology
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Request for Proposal (RFP)
#### Right to Repair

**Note:** This announcement is only relevant for awarding a contract for a service that provides manufacturing technologies.

### Reference Information
| Attribute | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Reference Number | ISED209241 | Government-issued solicitation number for the right to repair contract. |
| Amendment Number | 4 | The number of amendments to the original tender notice. |
| Date of Publication | 2023-11-23 | The date when the tender announcement was published. |
| Tender Closes | 2023-12-18T14:00:00 | Deadline for submission of proposals. The proposals will also be available at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25593/ISED209241---right-to-repair.pdf |

### Contract Information
| Attribute | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Expected Start Date | 2024-01-08 | Beginning of the contract term. |
| Expected End Date | 2024-03-22 | End of the contract term. |
| UNSPSC Code | 81140000 | UNSPSC category code for the contract. |
| UNSPSC Description | Manufacturing technologies | Description of the goods or services offered for the contract. |
| Procurement Category | SRV | Category of the procurement contract. |
| Notice Type | Request for Proposal | Type of procurement process used. |
| Procurement Method | Competitive - Open bidding | Type of bidding process used for the contract. |

### Trade Agreements
| Agreement Type | Agreement Name | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Trade Agreement | Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) | A list of countries for which the bid is open. |
| Trade Agreement | Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement | A list of countries for which the bid is open. |

### Contact Information
| Attribute | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Contact Name | Jordan Kearns | Name of the person to contact for more information. |
| Contact Email | Jordan.Kearns@ised-isde.gc.ca | Email address to contact the person. |
| Contact Phone | (343) 548-6416 | Phone number to contact the person. |

Note: I excluded some attributes that were redundant in the original input.

There is no additional information that needs to be added
